properties.name: Arena di Verona
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1Piazza Brà, 28The amazing Arena in Verona has also been shown on the popular TV show Armerica\'s Next Top Model. This is an awesome place to come visit and will never be forgotten

properties.name: Arizona Capitol Museum
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1 Phoenix, ArizonaI personally love Arizona, because I have so much history there. I think going to the museum is a great way to get a sense of the United States history.

properties.name: Basilica San Marco
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1 Venice, ItalyThe Basilica of San Marco is one of the most famous sights associated with Venice. The beautiful cavings and carvings and statues could never be replicated. I absolutely love the history Venice has, not to mention it being in such an amazing setting on the water. This is a great place to vacation and there is alway something to see and do.

properties.name: Breckenridge Mountian Village
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1Breckenridge, ColoradoThis is the village my family and friends stayed in for the duration of our stay. It is right next to the slopes and very close to town.

properties.name: Eastern Door of Baptistry
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1Florence, ItalyTo anyone planning on going to Florence this is one stop this must be made.

properties.name: FAO Schwarz
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1767 Fifth Avenue New York, NY 10153FAO Schwarz is one of the most amazing toy stores in the World! Even as an oloder teenagers I still enjoyed running around looking at all the amzing things. This just goes to show the hundreds of places there are to shop for anyone in New York

properties.name: Hotel Palatia
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1 Crete, GreeceThe Hotel Palatia is where my family and I stayed for most of our time in Greece. I can\'t even begin to describe the amazing hospitality we received while we were there, not to mention just being in such an awesome place. Greece has been by a far my favorite vacation.

properties.name: Lake Tahoe, CA
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1south lake tahoe, caLake Tahoe as beautiful as ever in the winter, but also in the summer. For someone to say they are going to California the normal thought is beaches and bikini\'s, but Tahoe is a little different. Tahoe is right in between the mountians, so a trip to the ski slopes isn\'t far at all.

properties.name: Momma Mia's Bakery
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1Hilton Head, SCThis bakery by a far has the most amazing foods I have ever tasted. And a lot of people know that it is good too, because there is always a long line to get something great to eat at this little bakery.

properties.name: San Diego Zoo
properties.description: Posted by Acrews1The San Diego Zoo is a great destination for any age group. There is such a vast variety habitats for each of the animals. From the Flamingos to Elephants it is a great thing to see.
